Sindiran Jokowi, Antara Humor Tinggi dan Kiat Jaga Koalisi
07 Nov 2019, 20:01 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) menyindir Ketum Partai NasDem Surya Paloh yang melakukan pertemuan dengan Presiden PKS Sohibul Iman. Sindiran itu kemudian dianggap sebagai humor tinggi Jokowi dan kiat menjaga koalisi.
Sindiran Jokowi itu terlontar saat Jokowi hadir di acara HUT ke-55 Golkar di Hotel Sultan, Jakarta, Rabu (6/11/2019). Di atas mimbar, Jokowi sontak menyapa Paloh dibarengi dengan sindiran.
"Bapak Surya Paloh yang kalau kita lihat malam hari ini lebih cerah dari biasanya. Sehabis pertemuan beliau dengan Pak Sohibul Iman di PKS. Wajahnya cerah setelah berangkulan dengan Pak Sohibul," kata Jokowi.
Sapaan Jokowi ke Paloh itu pun sontak membuat tamu undangan tertawa. Jokowi juga menyinggung soal rangkulan Paloh ke Sohibul Iman yang dinilainya tak biasa. Apalagi, Jokowi mengaku tak pernah dirangkul seerat itu oleh Paloh.
"Saya tidak tahu maknanya, tapi rangkulannya tidak seperti biasa. Tidak pernah saya dirangkul seperti itu," kata Jokowi.
Jokowi bahkan sempat bertanya kepada Paloh terkait alasannya bertemu dengan Sohibul. Dia bertanya karena NasDem masih berada di koalisi, sedangkan PKS di luar koalisi.
"Tapi jawabnya lain waktu. Saya tanya dong karena beliau masih di koalisi pemerintah," ucapnya.
Paloh langsung merespons sindiran Jokowi itu. Dia menilai Jokowi hanya bercanda dan memiliki selera humor tinggi.
"Masa kalian nggak tanggap? Pak Jokowi itu sense of humor yang tinggi, ha-ha-ha...," kata Paloh di Hotel Sultan.

Jokowi's Allusions, Between High Humor and Coalition Guarding Tips
Nov 7 2019, 20:01 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) quipped the Chairman of the NasDem Party Surya Paloh who had a meeting with PKS President Sohibul Iman. The satire was then considered Jokowi's high humor and tips on maintaining the coalition.
Jokowi's insinuation came out when Jokowi was present at the Golkar 55th Anniversary event at the Sultan Hotel, Jakarta, Wednesday (11/06/2019). On the pulpit, Jokowi suddenly greeted Paloh accompanied by innuendo.
"Mr. Surya Paloh who if we see tonight is brighter than usual. After his meeting with Mr. Sohibul Iman at PKS. His face was bright after embracing with Mr. Sohibul," Jokowi said.
Jokowi's greeting to Paloh suddenly made the guests laugh. Jokowi also mentioned Paloh's embrace to Sohibul Iman, which he considered unusual. Moreover, Jokowi claimed that Paloh had never been embraced that closely.
"I don't know the meaning, but the embrace is not as usual. I have never been embraced like that," Jokowi said.
Jokowi even asked Paloh about his reasons for meeting with Sohibul. He asked because NasDem was still in the coalition, while PKS was outside the coalition.
"But the answer is another time. I ask, because he is still in the government coalition," he said.
Paloh immediately responded to Jokowi's insinuation. He considered Jokowi only to joke and have a high sense of humor.
"Are you guys unresponsive? Mr. Jokowi is a high sense of humor, ha-ha-ha ...," Paloh said at the Sultan Hotel.
